Text: If you get 403 error from imageshack, copy the link, open a new tab, paste it and hit enter. Imageshack obviously started to check referers and block people coming from TPB.
any words on the quality? seems too small...

@yankiebar
Quality is fine. It was ripped with x264 codec. Not too small then. Besides, why don't you use the link to the screenshot gallery? Copy and paste that link to a new tab/window to make it work. Imageshack block the TBP referrer. That's why you get an error if you simply click it.
Thank you +1 also, nice job on the subtitles i hate going to some random website to look them on my own and everytime they are a little off sync, thanks again.
quality is ok for a movie of 1985, great great job on the subtitles, many thanks.
Small size, but good quality. It's an old movie, so don't expect bluray :D
